channel.title: Hamachi
channel.description:
Ok, I was just wondering how I can set up my server by using Hamachi. I can't get the no-ip to work and someone told me this is another way to allow people on your server. If I could get any info on this it would be a great help.
Thanks Tytn

item.title: Hamachi
item.dc:creator: @cutter cutter
item.description:
@cutter wrote:

ok download hamachi from hamachi.cc/download, and then go through the tut to teach u the basics.
after you have done that create a new network (your server name) and a password.
Now distribute this to the ppl u want on there, and then to let them get on your server tell them to put the server ip as the adress next to you name in the hamachi window.

Read full topic
